title: [Sponsor] Multi — Multiplayer Collaboration for macOS
content:
Multi is a new macOS collaboration layer that makes any app multiplayer.

  • Shared control for any app or display
  • Drawing & deep links for faster communication
  • Native app; crafted to feel like part of macOS

Since launching last month, we’ve seen an amazing response, in particular from the iOS/macOS/Apple and Typescript communities.

We built Multi to help software teams build faster together.

But also, to scratch an itch: What would multiplayer macOS look like?

We’d love to hear what you think. This week, Daring Fireball readers get immediate access.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
